title: Desktop Clients
description: Inspect and manage your cluster from your machine

items.title: Aptakube
items.description: A modern, lightweight and multi-cluster desktop client for Kubernetes. Connect to multiple clusters simultaneously, as if it was just one big cluster. View, edit and manage all your resources from your desktop.

items.title: k9s
items.description: K9s provides a terminal UI to interact with your Kubernetes clusters. The aim of this project is to make it easier to navigate, observe and manage your applications in the wild.

items.title: Lens
items.description: Lens is the only IDE you'll ever need to take control of your Kubernetes clusters, and any applications.

items.title: Kubernetic
items.description: Kubernetic is a brand new Desktop Client for Kubernetes that lets developers and ops manage their Kubernetes cluster(s) through a UI interface in a very simple way.
